title: Graveyard - Cemetery - Stylized Graveyard - Stylized Cemetery
description: A Modular Stylized Graveyard, Cemetery Environment To Unleash Your Imagination! (Graveyard, Stylized Graveyard, Cemetery, Stylized Cemetery, Tombstone, Horror, Modular, Halloween)
longDescription:
-> Watch The Trailer <- | ⬆️Upgrade Now! And Get The Entire Ultimate Fantasy Series Bundle (7 Packs) For A Heavily Discounted Price!



Story

The idea for this Graveyard environment was born due to multiple community requests for a stylized graveyard. We are proud to finally release it!


Style

The unique art style was Inspired by some of today's top stylized hits.



Features

  • Landscape Materials - blend contains 3 different textures (cobblestone/dirty sand/moss) and could be vertex painted as needed.
  • Wind - All the foliage in this scene is wind animated to give a more lively feel.
  • Roughness - all assets contain a changeable roughness setting (in material instance) perfect for those who want to achieve a wet feeling after it rains. It also gives us a lot more polys for each asset so it going to enhance the look!
  • Candle Variety - Candles contain a few different types of mesh, single candle, candle bunch and melted wax planes. This enables you to cover large surfaces with candles using the foliage tool. This makes things easier and far more optimized!
  • Grass Colors - The Grass has 2 color settings so you can easily change it as needed.
technicalDetails:
Number of Unique Meshes: 66

Number of Materials and Material Instances: 33

Number of Textures: 46

Texture Resolutions: (2048x2048)
